fplR

Get previous season's performance for an FPL user

Gives a tibble containing previous FPL season's performance info for a given user.

userHistory(user_id)

Arguments

user_id

FPL user ID (retrieve from the corresponding user's https://fantasy.premierleague.com team page URL).

Examples

userHistory(user_id = 123)
#> # A tibble: 1 x 6
#>         id season_name total_points   rank season   player
#> *    <int>       <chr>        <int>  <int>  <int>    <int>
#> 1 34517531     2015/16         2150 105852     10 24882616

Contents

  • Examples
